name: reputation-lists-parser
description: A microservice function for keep reputation lists updated

scripts.build-init: rm -rf dist && rm -f archive.zip && mkdir dist
scripts.build:install: cp package.json dist/ && cd dist && npm install --production
scripts.build: npm run build-init && npm run build:copy && npm run build:install && npm run zip && npm run build:clean
scripts.zip: cd dist && zip -rq archive.zip . && mv archive.zip ../
